TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed QueueMode extends System.Enum

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Speech.Tts.QueueMode Add = int32(1)

summary.para: Queue mode where the new entry is added at the end of the playback queue.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Speech.Tts.QueueMode Flush = int32(0)

summary.para: Queue mode where all entries in the playback queue (media to be played and text to be synthesized) are dropped and replaced by the new entry. Queues are flushed with respect to a given calling app. Entries in the queue from other callees are not discarded.
